rows.label: tlk41200122_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Armu are suuuuper cute and adorable
and sweet and pretty animals!

rows.label: tlk41200122_01_msg0003
rows.name:
They're different depending on the country they live in,
but Gulan Armu are gentle and calm,
and the way they move so slowly is irresistible!

rows.label: tlk41200122_01_msg0004
rows.name:
When you're traveling, they're hard workers who can
do anything, from carrying your luggage to giving you a ride!

rows.label: tlk41200122_01_msg0005
rows.name:
So?! Did you learn a looooot about
Armu?
